parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Cedric, it’s great to see you. I take it you have seen the calamity that has - \|\|\^
- taken place in Innes since we last saw each other. \|\|\^
Yes, I have Richard, it's gotten terribly worse. Seriously what happened - \|\|\^
Yes, Cedric, it’s true things have gotten worse. We need to find a solution - \|\|\^
- that appeases both sides. If I can’t resolve the issue here how am I going - \|\|\^
- to rule my own kingdom when this is all over? Roswell’s army is on its way - \|\|\^
- north, we need to unite Innes if it is to withstand invasion. An invasion of - \|\|\^
Yes, we need to but how will we find the right solution. \|\|\^
Well, it will be quite a task uniting the Aristocracy with the workers. - \|\|\^
- But we will have to prevail. I'm going to need you to go speak with both - \|\|\^
- parties within the city and come back to me once you have found out what - \|\|\^
\n<Richard> Hopefully between us, we can resolve this

I take it you spoke to the people and heard what they had to say? \|\|\^
The workers want a new king they want the current one gone. Whereas the - \|\|\^
- Aristocracy wants to return to normal where the workers don't have a say - \|\|\^
Ah, I see. I hope the common people in Haffenden don’t see us the way - \|\|\^
- they see the aristocracy here. Well, we needn’t worry about the King - \|\|\^
- he fled shortly after the rebellion began fearing the people would have - \|\|\^
- him executed. No one has seen him since, he could be dead for all we know. - \|\|\^
- I don’t know how we are going to find a new ruler, especially considering - \|\|\^
- Roswell has sent his armies north, they're attacking the southern borders - \|\|\^
- of Innes. It won’t be long until they reach the city. If we don’t unite - \|\|\^
- the city in time, it will fall. \|\|\^
Well, what are we going to do? \|\|\^
Bring me the representatives you spoke to. \|\|\^

Well, I see we have all gathered. \|\|\^
Oh, he's gone on a trip so I'm temporarily in charge until further notice. \|\|\^
Well, this is the Innes council for solution. Between us, we will find a way - \|\|\^
- to resolve the crisis taking place in the city. \|\|\^
Yes, the two of you have been chosen to be the representives of your - \|\|\^
- the representatives of your peers. Now each of you state what it is that - \|\|\^
We want Innes to go back to normal, we want our king back and the workers - \|\|\^
- to do their jobs like they were doing. It was a good system. \|\|\^
We the workers want change and want a new leader that represents all of us - \|\|\^
- and doesn't treat us like nothing. \|\|\^
You are nothing! You fail even to fulfil your purpose which is to work. \|\|\^
You arrogant pig! You're just scared that the Aristocracy will lose their wealth. \|\|\^
Enough! Order! I'm sure the two of you can come to an agreement. \|\|\^
I highly doubt it! Not after the way we have been treated. \|\|\^
Do you have evidence of being mistreated? \|\|\^
Yes, yes I do. I have a witness his name is Wallace. \|\|\^
Cedric go find this Wallace and bring him here. \|\|\^

Hello Wallace. Don't be startled, you’ve been summoned here to give evidence - \|\|\^
- of you being mistreated by people of the Aristocracy. \|\|\^
My Lord, I was beaten for asking to be paid for my hard work. They beat - \|\|\^
- me and told me should be grateful for what I get. \|\|\^
Thank you for your statement. You're free to leave, you will be rewarded. \|\|\^
So what! One person got attacked it’s not the end of the world. They're - \|\|\^
- the true savages though. I have a witness, Lady Alexina. \|\|\^

Hello Lady Alexina, thank you for coming you're a witness to an incident - \|\|\^
My lord! Roswell’s armies have made it to the city! \|\|\^
What! Already? We haven't united the people they won't be able to defend - \|\|\^
Then what are we going to do? \|\|\^
We have to flee, Innes needs to surrender to minimise damage and the - \|\|\^
- strain on resources. We can work on a strategy to free Innes in  - \|\|\^
- Luthania. Go to Luthania now! I will meet you thereafter I have sorted - \|\|\^
